_comment: Known Printer Configuration Profiles - References other databases for details

printers.name: Creality Ender 3
printers.notes: Most popular budget printer. Huge community support.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 V2 Neo
printers.notes: V2 with CR Touch and PEI bed pre-installed.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 V3 SE
printers.notes: Budget V3 with Sprite Lite direct drive.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 V3 Plus
printers.notes: Large format CoreXY Ender 3. Klipper based.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 S1
printers.notes: Direct drive Sprite extruder. CR Touch included.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 S1 Pro
printers.notes: 300°C all-metal Sprite Pro. LED light bar.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 Max
printers.notes: Large format Ender 3. Dual Z optional.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 Max Neo
printers.notes: Max with CR Touch and dual Z standard.

printers.name: Creality Ender 3 Neo
printers.notes: Ender 3 with CR Touch and metal extruder.

printers.name: Creality Ender 5
printers.notes: Cube frame. Bed moves Z only.

printers.name: Creality CR-6 Max
printers.notes: Large format CR-6. Triple Z motors.

printers.name: Creality CR-10
printers.notes: Large format classic. Separate control box.

printers.name: Creality CR-10S
printers.notes: Dual Z. Filament runout. Resume print.

printers.name: Creality CR-10S Pro
printers.notes: Bondtech extruder clone. Auto bed leveling.

printers.name: Creality CR-10 S5
printers.notes: 500mm build volume. Requires bed support mods.

printers.name: Creality CR-30 PrintMill
printers.notes: Belt printer. Infinite Z. 45 degree print head.

printers.name: Creality Sermoon D1
printers.notes: Enclosed with HEPA filter. LED lighting.

printers.name: Creality K1 Max
printers.notes: Large K1 with AI camera and LIDAR.

printers.name: Creality K1C
printers.notes: K1 with carbon fiber capable hardened nozzle.

printers.name: Creality CR-M4
printers.notes: Industrial large format. Quad Z motors.

printers.name: Creality Halot One
printers.notes: MSLA resin printer. Integral cover. WiFi.

printers.name: Prusa MK4
printers.notes: Load cell bed leveling. Input shaping. PrusaLink.

printers.name: Anycubic i3 Mega X
printers.notes: Large i3 Mega. Dual Z motors.

printers.name: Anycubic Photon Mono
printers.notes: Mono LCD. 2.5s layer cure. Fast printing.

printers.name: Elegoo Neptune 3
printers.notes: Direct drive. Auto bed leveling. Budget printer.

printers.name: Elegoo Neptune 3 Pro
printers.notes: Dual Z. LED lighting. Quiet printing.

printers.name: Elegoo Neptune 3 Plus
printers.notes: Large format Neptune. Dual Z standard.

printers.name: Elegoo Neptune 3 Max
printers.notes: Extra large format. Triple Z motor.

printers.name: Elegoo Saturn 2
printers.notes: 10 inch 8K mono screen. Very large MSLA.

printers.name: Artillery Sidewinder X1
printers.notes: Large format direct drive. AC heated bed.

printers.name: Bambu Lab X1
printers.notes: High-end CoreXY. AI camera. LiDAR leveling.

printers.name: Bambu Lab X1 Carbon
printers.notes: Hardened nozzle. Carbon fiber capable. AMS compatible.

printers.name: Bambu Lab X1E
printers.notes: Enterprise version. Fully enclosed. HEPA filtration.

printers.name: Bambu Lab P1P
printers.notes: Budget CoreXY. No screen. Spaghetti detection.

printers.name: Bambu Lab P1S
printers.notes: Enclosed P1P. Hardened nozzle. AMS compatible.

printers.name: Bambu Lab A1
printers.notes: Bed slinger. AMS Lite compatible. Full color.

printers.name: Bambu Lab A1 Mini
printers.notes: Compact bed slinger. Great beginner printer.

printers.name: FlashForge Adventurer 3
printers.notes: Enclosed. Quick change nozzle. Cloud printing.

printers.name: FlashForge Finder
printers.notes: Entry level enclosed. Kid-safe. WiFi enabled.

printers.name: QIDI X-MAX
printers.notes: Enclosed large format. Dual Z. High temp capable.

printers.name: QIDI X-Plus
printers.notes: Mid-size enclosed. WiFi. Carbon fiber capable.

printers.name: QIDI iFast
printers.notes: IDEX dual extruder. Enclosed. Industrial grade.

printers.name: Tronxy XY-2 Pro
printers.notes: Budget bed slinger. Titan clone extruder.

printers.name: Tronxy XY-3 Pro
printers.notes: Large format with direct drive option.

printers.name: BIQU Hurakan
printers.notes: Klipper based. H2 extruder. Input shaping.

printers.name: Voron Trident
printers.notes: Triple Z bed. Simpler than 2.4. Great rigidity.

printers.name: Voron Legacy
printers.notes: Original Voron updated. Uses legacy parts.

printers.name: RatRig V-Minion
printers.notes: Compact bed slinger. Great for beginners.

printers.name: Sovol SV02
printers.notes: Dual extruder single nozzle. Color mixing.

printers.name: Sovol SV06
printers.notes: Prusa clone. Full metal frame. Great value.

printers.name: Voxelab Aquila
printers.notes: Ender 3 V2 clone. Great budget option.

printers.name: Kingroon KP3S
printers.notes: Compact direct drive. Linear rails. Budget.

printers.name: Kingroon KP5L
printers.notes: Large format. Linear rails on all axes.

printers.name: Ultimaker S5
printers.notes: Large format professional. Material station available.

printers.name: Ultimaker S7
printers.notes: Updated S5. Flexible build plate. Air manager.

printers.name: Raise3D Pro3
printers.notes: EVE dual extrusion. Auto bed leveling.

printers.name: MakerBot METHOD
printers.notes: Industrial. Heated chamber. Dry material bay.

printers.name: Monoprice Maker Select
printers.notes: Wanhao i3 rebrand. Good budget option.

printers.name: Wanhao Duplicator 12
printers.notes: Dual extruder option. Large variants available.

printers.name: Geeetech A30
printers.notes: Large format. Auto bed leveling option.

printers.name: FLSun Super Racer
printers.notes: Fast delta. BMG clone direct drive.

printers.name: SeeMeCNC Rostock MAX
printers.notes: High quality delta kit. FSR bed probing.

printers.name: Peopoly Moai
printers.notes: True SLA with galvo mirrors. High precision.

printers.name: Anet A8
printers.notes: Classic budget kit. Fire hazard - upgrade MOSFET!

printers.name: Anet A6
printers.notes: Prusa i3 style. Needs safety upgrades.

printers.name: Anet E10
printers.notes: CR-10 style frame. Better than A8.

printers.name: Comgrow T500
printers.notes: Very large format. Quad Z motors.

printers.name: Lotmaxx SC-10 Shark
printers.notes: Dual color. Laser engraving module option.

printers.name: Tenlog TL-D3 Pro
printers.notes: IDEX system. Mirror and duplicate modes.

printers.name: Alunar M508
printers.notes: Prusa i3 clone. Budget kit printer.

printers.name: FLSun Prusa i3
printers.notes: Budget Prusa clone. Early FLSun model.

printers.name: Zonestar P802
printers.notes: Prusa i3 clone. Mix color variants.

printers.name: Tractus3D T850
printers.notes: Industrial delta. Very tall Z axis.

_metadata.notes: This database includes FDM, MSLA, DLP, SLA, and SLS printers. Resin printers have null hotend/extruder values. Belt printers have infinite Z. Some companies are defunct but printers still in use.
